data.name: Star Shaman
data.detailed_description:
Become a Star Shaman and embark on an epic journey in this roguelike space shooter.

Hop from planet to planet in a stunningly beautiful and procedurally generated universe, where no playthrough is ever the same - except for the outstanding French-Touch infused soundtrack.



Invoke your weapons using a unique and ultra-satisfying motion-based spellcasting system that will soon make you feel invincible.



Fall, try again and unlock powerful new weapons and abilities to find your playstyle.



Battle armadas of deadly mechanical enemies until you reach epic boss fights that block your path to new solar systems. Along the way, you will meet a quirky roster of characters.



And don't forget to admire the finer details of the extraordinary life forms you're bringing back to life as you chase the corrupt Architects of Entropy to the most remote corners of their cubic universe.



For you are a Star Shaman, a champion of biodiversity, and the galaxy's last resort.

Features:
  • 9 powerful weapons to unlock
  • A unique spell casting system made for VR
  • 3 solar systems to revive
  • The funkiest soundtrack in VR
  • 50+ unlockable feats
  • 11 unique achievements
  • Built-in Timer for speedruns

data.short_description: STAR SHAMAN is an active VR shooter with great looks and unique moves. Travel through procedural solar systems to a funky French-touch soundtrack and battle hordes of enemies with a unique spellcasting system that will make you feel powerful.The Universe is counting on you, Shaman!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Stunning visuals, fun gameplay, and groovy tunes combine to make this an instant favourite”
VR Explorer

“I can definitely recommend the game to fans of Star Pirate Trainer or Pistol Whip.”
PIXEL.DE

“It’s a brilliantly fluid approach to VR gunplay, swapping out the raw, often rigid intricacies of realistic weapon reloading for something with decided pace and groove.”
UploadVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 480
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon R9 480 or greater
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
